# Simple Small Business Listing

Provides a Businesses custom post type and Location and Type taxonomies.

**Contributors:** [topher1kenobe](http://profiles.wordpress.org/topher1kenobe)  
**Tags:** [](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/)  
**Requires at least:** 3.0  
**Tested up to:** 5.4  
**Stable tag:** 1.1  
**License:** [GPLv2 or later](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)  

## Description ##

Provides a Businesses custom post type and Location and Type taxonomies. This is intended to be used with the Cambridge Small Business child theme to render business info during the Coronavirus.  It should work for just about any small business listing though. Also look for the ACF export file for the extra fields.

## Installation ##

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

1. Upload the `simple-small-business-listing` folder to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
1. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
1. Create new Businesses

## Usage ##

Submissions:
See export file for WSForm
